name: Torchic
author: 5ban Graphics
flavor_text: A fire burns inside, so it feels very warm to hug. It launches fireballs of 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit.

ancient_trait.name: Ω  Barrage
ancient_trait.effect: This Pokémon may attack twice a turn. (If the first attack Knocks Out your opponent’s Active Pokémon, you may attack again after your opponent chooses a new Active Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Flare Bonus
attacks.effect: Discard a {R} Energy card from your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Claw
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.
